attributes.action: Radically change the current labour centrist position, and to return to the days of a truely socialist labour party for the working class.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: since the founding of tony blair's "new labour" the labour party are more and more alienating themselves from the u.k's working class. please sign the following petition for the labour government to shift their economic and social policies back to the left and to once again be a leftist party, representing the working class.
